txt.en: 'Welcome to Suri-kyl채. Please be sure to behave yourself while you are here.'
'I have heard stories about unnatural spirits stirring from within the ice.'
'The Susi-v채ki are a treacherous enemy. We must be strong and united against our foes.'
'Please take warmth in our fires. In the S청ri-kyl채, we are no strangers to providing hospitality.'
'Make sure that you are dressed properly; our land is not forgiving.'
